sub_title: Supply Chain & Data Analysis | Solution builder, Lean Thinking & Process Improvement
summary:
An accomplished, innovative, and detail-oriented Civil Engineer and Production Coordinator with nearly a decade of experience, adept at performing an array of Project Management, Lean Production, Continuous Improvement, Supply Chain, and Operations functions. I have the hiker’s mindset of “leave it better than you found it” inspiring my approach at work, whether it’s people, processes, or the organization as a whole. I nerd out on process improvements and have strong feelings about new technologies in the industry of engineering. I love my job the most when I get to take on challenges that allow me to learn and grow, and when I’m supporting people and teams to do their best work.

I have the capacity to bring structure within chaos and translate different points of view into a strategic plan. Capable of promoting an impact and communicate it with a minimum amount of time and get the message across clearly. Possess a client-focused and innovative mindset, having dealt with different cultures and a variety of business contexts. Discovering, understanding, and explaining trends of engineering and production planning and what they mean for business, are my key focus areas. I have worked with companies in Brazil and Netherlands helping them increase productivity, and accelerate collaboration.

Possess strong leadership, communication, and language skills needed in liaising with all levels of staff and stakeholders to support their needs while maximizing service levels and achieving business goals. A results-driven and passionate individual, with displayed ability to work independently even under pressure, multitasking on assignments, and meeting strict deadlines. Skilled in developing relationships that empower colleagues by building confidence and competence to achieve better performance. My success to date has been driven by a very strong service philosophy based on integrity, competence, understanding, and a responsive operational style.

certifications.name: Master Control in Supply Chain Management and Logistics
TUM Lean Six Sigma Yellow Belt
QPLS1x: Six Sigma: Define and Measure
QPLS2x: Six Sigma: Analyze, Improve, Control

profile_positions.description:
𝗠𝗲𝗻𝘁𝗼𝗿 𝗪𝗼𝗿𝗹𝗱𝘄𝗶𝗱𝗲 𝗟𝗟𝗖 𝗶𝘀 𝗮𝗻 𝗔𝗺𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗰𝗮𝗻 𝗰𝗼𝗺𝗽𝗮𝗻𝘆 𝘁𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝘀𝘂𝗽𝗽𝗹𝗶𝗲𝘀 𝘀𝘂𝗿𝗴𝗶𝗰𝗮𝗹 𝗮𝗲𝘀𝘁𝗵𝗲𝘁𝗶𝗰𝘀 𝗽𝗿𝗼𝗱𝘂𝗰𝘁𝘀 𝘁𝗼 𝗽𝗹𝗮𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗰 𝘀𝘂𝗿𝗴𝗲𝗼𝗻𝘀. 𝗔𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗹𝗱’𝘀 𝗹𝗲𝗮𝗱𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗺𝗮𝗸𝗲𝗿 𝗼𝗳 𝗵𝗶𝗴𝗵-𝗾𝘂𝗮𝗹𝗶𝘁𝘆 𝗯𝗿𝗲𝗮𝘀𝘁 𝗶𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗮𝗻𝘁𝘀 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗼𝘃𝗲𝗿 𝟯𝟬 𝘆𝗲𝗮𝗿𝘀, 𝗠𝗘𝗡𝗧𝗢𝗥® 𝗵𝗮𝘀 𝗯𝗲𝗲𝗻 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝘁𝗿𝘂𝘀𝘁𝗲𝗱 𝗰𝗵𝗼𝗶𝗰𝗲 𝗯𝘆 𝗺𝗶𝗹𝗹𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀 𝗼𝗳 𝘄𝗼𝗺𝗲𝗻 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗹𝗱𝘄𝗶𝗱𝗲.

Accountable for the Distribution Requirements Planning (DRP) Daily Review for the APAC and LATAM regions.

Partner with regional planners and the global team to ensure max efficiency in the distribution, increase the service level, and reduce backorder.

Creating Excel-based tools and SQL queries to support daily operations and analysis, reducing decision-making time.

Leading continuous improvement projects related to changing or designing new processes and creating standard procedure documents to support knowledge transfer.

profile_positions.description: 𝗧𝗠𝗖 𝗶𝘀 𝗮 𝘂𝗻𝗶𝗾𝘂𝗲 𝗰𝗼𝗹𝗹𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗼𝗳 𝘀𝗲𝗹𝗳-𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴, 𝗵𝗶𝗴𝗵𝗹𝘆 𝘀𝗸𝗶𝗹𝗹𝗲𝗱 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗮𝗹𝗺𝗼𝘀𝘁 𝘀𝗲𝗹𝗳-𝗲𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗼𝘆𝗲𝗱 𝘁𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗻𝗶𝗰𝗮𝗹 𝗽𝗿𝗼𝗳𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻𝗮𝗹𝘀. 𝗜𝘁𝘀 𝘂𝗻𝗽𝗮𝗿𝗮𝗹𝗹𝗲𝗹𝗲𝗱 𝗘𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗼𝘆𝗲𝗻𝗲𝘂𝗿𝘀𝗵𝗶𝗽 𝗺𝗼𝗱𝗲𝗹 𝗼𝗳𝗳𝗲𝗿𝘀 𝗲𝗻𝗴𝗶𝗻𝗲𝗲𝗿𝘀 𝗳𝗿𝗼𝗺 𝗮𝗹𝗹 𝗯𝗮𝗰𝗸𝗴𝗿𝗼𝘂𝗻𝗱𝘀 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗰𝗼𝗺𝗳𝗼𝗿𝘁𝘀 𝗼𝗳 𝗲𝗺𝗽𝗹𝗼𝘆𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗼𝗽𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝘂𝗻𝗶𝘁𝗶𝗲𝘀 𝗼𝗳 𝗲𝗻𝘁𝗿𝗲𝗽𝗿𝗲𝗻𝗲𝘂𝗿𝘀𝗵𝗶𝗽.
profile_positions.title: Supply Chain Engineer

profile_positions.description:
𝗚𝗼𝗰𝗮𝘀𝗲 𝗶𝘀 𝗮 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗹𝗱𝘄𝗶𝗱𝗲 𝗲-𝗰𝗼𝗺𝗺𝗲𝗿𝗰𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗮𝘁 𝘀𝗲𝗹𝗹𝘀 𝗽𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗼𝗻𝗮𝗹𝗶𝘀𝗲𝗱 𝘀𝗺𝗮𝗿𝘁𝗽𝗵𝗼𝗻𝗲 𝗮𝗰𝗰𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗼𝗿𝗶𝗲𝘀 𝗼𝗻 𝗱𝗲𝗺𝗮𝗻𝗱.

Levelled the production operation by applying continuous flow, implementing and tracking KPI's, and developing an order troubleshooting system, resulting in a stable fulfilment time and a 67% reduction to the one-day mark.

Designed and stood up Inventory Management team, process and layout to support long-term company growth strategy, resulting in zero stock-outs, increased stock visibility, and stock levels optimization.

Led partnership with IT, Customer Service, Growth and Illustration teams, creating squads to discuss strategies, improvements and report issues, resulting in a better definition of responsibilities, a decrease in problem-solving time, an increase in the company's NPS, and better prioritization of system improvements.

Partnered in the development of processes, policies and procedures, and was essential to support the development of training and talent, structuring the operation that resulted in a better definition of Roles and Responsibilities, which enabled the creation of feedback and onboarding routines.
profile_positions.title: Production Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
𝙂𝙤𝙘𝙖𝙨𝙚 𝙞𝙨 𝙖 𝙬𝙤𝙧𝙡𝙙𝙬𝙞𝙙𝙚 𝙚-𝙘𝙤𝙢𝙢𝙚𝙧𝙘𝙚 𝙩𝙝𝙖𝙩 𝙨𝙚𝙡𝙡𝙨 𝙥𝙚𝙧𝙨𝙤𝙣𝙖𝙡𝙞𝙨𝙚𝙙 𝙨𝙢𝙖𝙧𝙩𝙥𝙝𝙤𝙣𝙚 𝙖𝙘𝙘𝙚𝙨𝙨𝙤𝙧𝙞𝙚𝙨 𝙤𝙣 𝙙𝙚𝙢𝙖𝙣𝙙.

Assisted in the planning, managing, and executing production operations and coordinated and planned production priorities, workflow, and schedule.

Processes large volumes of data related to production, using Metabase (SQL queries), Excel and Google Sheets, establishing and monitoring KPIs to improve the decision-making process.

Identified and reported operational and maintenance problems to prevent production delays and scheduled routine inspection and maintenance to avoid equipment breakdowns and malfunctioning.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Production Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗿𝗮𝗰𝘁: 𝘗𝘳𝘰𝘨𝘳𝘢𝘮 𝘜𝘳𝘣𝘢𝘯𝘪𝘻𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘩𝘪𝘨𝘩𝘸𝘢𝘺 𝘸𝘰𝘳𝘬 𝘧𝘰𝘳 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘛𝘰𝘶𝘳𝘪𝘴𝘮 𝘌𝘯𝘩𝘢𝘯𝘤𝘦𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘵 𝘗𝘳𝘰𝘨𝘳𝘢𝘮 𝘰𝘧 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘞𝘦𝘴𝘵 𝘊𝘰𝘢𝘴𝘵 𝘰𝘧 𝘊𝘦𝘢𝘳á 𝘧𝘪𝘯𝘢𝘯𝘤𝘦𝘥 𝘣𝘺 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘈𝘯𝘥𝘦𝘢𝘯 𝘋𝘦𝘷𝘦𝘭𝘰𝘱𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘵 𝘊𝘰𝘳𝘱𝘰𝘳𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯 (𝘊𝘈𝘍). 𝘜𝘚$ 160 𝘮𝘪𝘭𝘭𝘪𝘰𝘯.

Site engineer on the Restauration of the Highway CE-163 with a total length of 37.77 km, and Urbanization of Praça José Batista de Carvalho, in the municipality of Paracuru/C.E.

Responsible for supervising and evaluating the work done by contractors.

Prepared a report on the progress of the works and technical, environmental, health, safety and social issues, resulting in compliance with the project scope, budget and schedule, norms and local legislation.

Held meetings with stakeholders to follow up on the progress of the projects and discuss issues and solutions to them.
profile_positions.title: Site Civil Enginner

profile_positions.description:
𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗿𝗮𝗰𝘁: 𝘗𝘳𝘰𝘨𝘳𝘢𝘮 𝘜𝘳𝘣𝘢𝘯𝘪𝘻𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘩𝘪𝘨𝘩𝘸𝘢𝘺 𝘸𝘰𝘳𝘬 𝘧𝘰𝘳 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘛𝘰𝘶𝘳𝘪𝘴𝘮 𝘌𝘯𝘩𝘢𝘯𝘤𝘦𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘵 𝘗𝘳𝘰𝘨𝘳𝘢𝘮 𝘰𝘧 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘞𝘦𝘴𝘵 𝘊𝘰𝘢𝘴𝘵 𝘰𝘧 𝘊𝘦𝘢𝘳á 𝘧𝘪𝘯𝘢𝘯𝘤𝘦𝘥 𝘣𝘺 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘈𝘯𝘥𝘦𝘢𝘯 𝘋𝘦𝘷𝘦𝘭𝘰𝘱𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘵 𝘊𝘰𝘳𝘱𝘰𝘳𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯 (𝘊𝘈𝘍). 𝘜𝘚$ 160 𝘮𝘪𝘭𝘭𝘪𝘰𝘯.

Managed and developed geometry and signalling projects for roads and intersections and earthworks projects for squares and parking lots using AutoCAD Civil 3D, quickly meeting the client's demands for changes in projects or on the development of new ones, resulting in compliance with the expected time.

Was responsible for the preliminary investigations at the conceptualisation and planning stages of the programs and led the design team, in charge of the elaboration of geometry and signage projects for roads, streets, and intersections, in addition to earthmoving projects using AutoCAD Civil 3D.

Monitored and controlled earthmoving and paving services using AutoCAD Civil 3D, resulting in better services performance and quality improvement. Managed the elaboration of road projects, monitored subcontractors and checked AutoCAD designs and construction budgets.
profile_positions.title: Site Civil Engineer

profile_positions.description:
𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗿𝗮𝗰𝘁: 𝘐𝘮𝘱𝘭𝘦𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘵𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯 𝘰𝘧 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘉𝘶𝘴 𝘙𝘢𝘱𝘪𝘥 𝘛𝘳𝘢𝘯𝘴𝘪𝘵 (𝘉𝘙𝘛) 𝘚𝘺𝘴𝘵𝘦𝘮 𝘪𝘯 𝘊𝘢𝘶𝘤𝘢𝘪𝘢 𝘤𝘪𝘵𝘺 𝘧𝘪𝘯𝘢𝘯𝘤𝘦𝘥 𝘣𝘺 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘈𝘯𝘥𝘦𝘢𝘯 𝘋𝘦𝘷𝘦𝘭𝘰𝘱𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘵 𝘊𝘰𝘳𝘱𝘰𝘳𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯 (𝘊𝘈𝘍).𝘜𝘚$ 2 𝘮𝘪𝘭𝘭𝘪𝘰𝘯.

Led the contract management, which included scope, cost, and quality control oversight, supervising sub-contractors, directly responsible for holding follow up meetings and reviewing the delivered products. 

Provided technical assistance to the client in reviewing designs, audits, and support to the Public Transport Coordinator for the municipality of Caucaia in assessing contractor claims for contract price adjustments.

profile_positions.description:
𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗿𝗮𝗰𝘁: 𝘗𝘳𝘰𝘨𝘳𝘢𝘮 𝘜𝘳𝘣𝘢𝘯𝘪𝘻𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘩𝘪𝘨𝘩𝘸𝘢𝘺 𝘸𝘰𝘳𝘬 𝘧𝘰𝘳 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘛𝘰𝘶𝘳𝘪𝘴𝘮 𝘌𝘯𝘩𝘢𝘯𝘤𝘦𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘵 𝘗𝘳𝘰𝘨𝘳𝘢𝘮 𝘰𝘧 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘞𝘦𝘴𝘵 𝘊𝘰𝘢𝘴𝘵 𝘰𝘧 𝘊𝘦𝘢𝘳á 𝘧𝘪𝘯𝘢𝘯𝘤𝘦𝘥 𝘣𝘺 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘈𝘯𝘥𝘦𝘢𝘯 𝘋𝘦𝘷𝘦𝘭𝘰𝘱𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘵 𝘊𝘰𝘳𝘱𝘰𝘳𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯 (𝘊𝘈𝘍). 𝘜𝘚$ 160 𝘮𝘪𝘭𝘭𝘪𝘰𝘯.

Learned AutoCAD Civil 3D and developed a service tracking system to follow-up earthmoving works and paving works (subbase, base, and surface course), together with the survey team, resulting in accurate monthly measurement reports.

Supported the Civil Engineering Team, working on new calculations, and analysing budgets, schedules, and technical drawings of buildings, increasing the accuracy of the Projects.

Implemented a standard workflow and reports in the Project Analysis Area, resulting in a time decrease in the project's analysis, standard reports, and knowledge retention.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Civil Engineer

profile_positions.description:
𝗖𝗼𝗻𝘁𝗿𝗮𝗰𝘁: 𝘗𝘳𝘰𝘨𝘳𝘢𝘮 𝘜𝘳𝘣𝘢𝘯𝘪𝘻𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘩𝘪𝘨𝘩𝘸𝘢𝘺 𝘸𝘰𝘳𝘬 𝘧𝘰𝘳 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘛𝘰𝘶𝘳𝘪𝘴𝘮 𝘌𝘯𝘩𝘢𝘯𝘤𝘦𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘵 𝘗𝘳𝘰𝘨𝘳𝘢𝘮 𝘰𝘧 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘞𝘦𝘴𝘵 𝘊𝘰𝘢𝘴𝘵 𝘰𝘧 𝘊𝘦𝘢𝘳á 𝘧𝘪𝘯𝘢𝘯𝘤𝘦𝘥 𝘣𝘺 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘈𝘯𝘥𝘦𝘢𝘯 𝘋𝘦𝘷𝘦𝘭𝘰𝘱𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘵 𝘊𝘰𝘳𝘱𝘰𝘳𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯 (𝘊𝘈𝘍). 𝘜𝘚$ 160 𝘮𝘪𝘭𝘭𝘪𝘰𝘯.

Prepared timely assistance in investigations survey and design together with the preparation of work schedules and estimates. 

Provided assistance with project management, including monitoring of quality assurance, and asset management components.
profile_positions.title: Civil Engineering Intern

profile_positions.description:
𝗝𝗼𝘁𝗮𝗱𝗼𝗶𝘀 𝗶𝘀 𝗮 𝘄𝗲𝗹𝗹-𝗸𝗻𝗼𝘄𝗻 𝗣𝗿𝗲𝗰𝗮𝘀𝘁 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝗰𝗿𝗲𝘁𝗲 𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗽𝗮𝗻𝘆 𝘄𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲 𝗜 𝘄𝗼𝗿𝗸𝗲𝗱  𝗮𝘀𝘀𝗶𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗙𝗮𝗰𝘁𝗼𝗿𝘆 𝗠𝗮𝗻𝗮𝗴𝗲𝗿 𝗱𝘂𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗳𝗶𝗿𝘀𝘁 𝘆𝗲𝗮𝗿 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗱𝘂𝗿𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝘀𝗲𝗰𝗼𝗻𝗱 𝘆𝗲𝗮𝗿 𝗮𝘀𝘀𝗶𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗦𝗶𝘁𝗲 𝗘𝗻𝗴𝗶𝗻𝗲𝗲𝗿.

Responsible for checking the quality and production of the concrete pieces, and in the last 12 months, 

Supervised pavement works and maintenance services in precast concrete structures. 

Ran analysis of precast pieces design and budget, and technical visits to the work sites.
profile_positions.title: Civil Engineering Intern
